page.title: 13HOME LIFE - FAMILY LIFE
page.content:
I live at 82 Waddington Road in Accrington. My sister has a job at a newspaper called the Weekly Herald and she is a{type setter.}My other sister has just left college and is applying for a job. I am still at school - it is called Peel Park. This year is my last year at this school. Next year I am going to Hollins School in Baxenden. I have two cats, a guinea pig and a fish. The guinea pig does not live at my house - it lives at Oak Hill park and it is called Toffee. I won my goldfish at a fair - it is called Bubbles and my two cats are called Tat and Sooty.
Caroline Place.
